content: Thank you for your proposal, Aziz. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. However, I must say that 600 Euros per month is quite high for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim. name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for your understanding, Aziz. I believe a rental price of around 500 Euros per month would be more reasonable for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim. As for other requirements or preferences, I would like the tenant to sign a long-term lease (at least one year) and pay a security deposit of one month's rent upfront. Additionally, I would like the tenant to maintain the apartment in good condition and not sublet it to anyone else without my prior consent.

As for any other questions or concerns, please feel free to ask me anything you need to know. I am here to help you find a suitable rental arrangement for your needs.
name: Heinrich Heine
